Name: Minsterhorn Postcard
Description: Once a tranquil village, Minsterhorn fell to ruin in the flames of the Asterleeds Independence War. In its quiet aftermath, the surviving villagers returned to reclaim and rebuild their homes...
Description$english: Once a tranquil village, Minsterhorn fell to ruin in the flames of the Asterleeds Independence War. In its quiet aftermath, the surviving villagers returned to reclaim and rebuild their homes...
Description2$english: Obtaining this item will unlock the corresponding postcard, which can be viewed in the "Archive."
